A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While some loyal star wars fans have voiced their displeasure for The Last Jedi\, I thoroughly enjoyed this film! I did feel that Finn and Rose's arc slowed the pacing\, but only slightly. I still liked that it gave us some backstory for Rose\, a new character that we knew nothing about. I think that the fight scenes were some of the best I've seen in a Star Wars film\, and perhaps my favorite explosion since the original deathstar. Finally\, I liked that the film kept me guessing what would happen with a few surprises!
